about_the_game:
Keep your friends close and your Enemigos even closer! This one-two-three punch character pack will let you save the Mexiverse in style.

Play as El Muñeco, a dashing magician with a penchant for performance. Suit up as Uay Pek and drink in the full power of the Dead World. Intimidate your foes with the ferocious feline moves of Jaguar Javier.

Each new playable character comes with unique attributes that add a fresh tactical twist to your adventure.

Master all three Enemigos and capture the new Achievements to prove it!
detailed_description:
Keep your friends close and your Enemigos even closer! This one-two-three punch character pack will let you save the Mexiverse in style.

Play as El Muñeco, a dashing magician with a penchant for performance. Suit up as Uay Pek and drink in the full power of the Dead World. Intimidate your foes with the ferocious feline moves of Jaguar Javier.

Each new playable character comes with unique attributes that add a fresh tactical twist to your adventure.

Master all three Enemigos and capture the new Achievements to prove it!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10, 8, 7
  • Processor: 2 Ghz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 5.0 (DX11 support required), 2 GB available graphics memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supports Xbox 360 Controller and other XInput-compatible controllers

short_description: Keep your friends close and your Enemigos even closer! This one-two-three punch character pack will let you save the Mexiverse in style. Play as El Muñeco, Uay Pek or Jaguar Javier. Each new playable character comes with unique attributes that add a fresh tactical twist to your adventure.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
